body:
@bradfitz thanks for the quick response.

I'm thinking it's around ``net.Listener`` and family.

I didn't want to include links to travis-ci, but the problem only manifests itself while running the tests.

```
git clone https://github.com/buger/gor.git
cd gor
git checkout fix_tests
go get ./...
go test ./... -v -timeout 60s -race
```

I will really appreciate help in debugging this.

Thanks
